name: Saitama & Genos Deck
author: ChatGPT
description: Epic Duels–compatible deck for Saitama and Genos.

cards.name: Serious Face
cards.rulesText: cost 1SP — Play when Saitama would take damage: gain Armor, reducing the next damage by 3.

cards.name: Caped Baldy Stroll
cards.rulesText: cost 1MP — Saitama moves up to 4 squares.

cards.name: Comical Timing
cards.rulesText: cost 1MP — Swap places with an ally within 4 squares.

cards.name: Discount Obsession
cards.rulesText: cost 1MP — Push one enemy 3 squares toward Saitama.

cards.name: ONE PUNCH!!!
cards.rulesText: cost 4PP — Deal 6 damage to an adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Consecutive Normal Punches
cards.rulesText: cost 2PP/1MP — Deal 3 damage to up to two adjacent enemies and push each 1 square away.

cards.name: Serious Series: Serious Punch
cards.rulesText: cost 5PP — Deal 8 damage to any enemy; it becomes Vulnerable until its next turn ends.

cards.name: Rapid Upgrades
cards.rulesText: cost 2PP/1MP — Genos shifts 2 squares, gains Empowered, then deals 3 damage to an adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Augmented Aim
cards.rulesText: cost 1SP/1MP — Genos moves 2 squares; his next ranged attack this turn gains +2 damage (Focused).

cards.name: Incineration Cannon
cards.rulesText: cost 3PP — Deal 5 damage to an enemy within 6 squares and inflict Bleeding.

cards.name: Rocket Barrage
cards.rulesText: cost 2PP — Deal 3 damage to up to two enemies within 4 squares.

cards.name: Bodyguard Protocol
cards.rulesText: cost 1SP/1MP — Play when Saitama is targeted: Genos swaps positions with him and gains Armor.

cards.name: Tactical Evac
cards.rulesText: cost 2MP — Genos and an adjacent ally each move up to 4 squares.

cards.name: Master & Disciple Combo
cards.rulesText: cost 2PP/1MP — Deal 4 damage to an enemy within 2 squares of Genos; then Saitama may move adjacent to that enemy.
